Senior Software Engineer I - CallRail

January 2019 - Present

Maintained, enhanced, and expanded Superadmin. This system provides a custom employee facing admin console with a variety of features that allows CallRail employees to administer accounts, perform CRUD actions, and gain analytical insight over 100,000 companies that use CallRail.

Organizational Responsibilities:

  • Collaborate with developers, QA, and product owners to prioritize needs and produce high quality software features.

Selected Accomplishments:

  • Added feature to classify CallRail agency accounts by whether or not accounts were created by marketing agencies.
  • Helped implement major UI redesign for employee facing portion of the CallRail app.
  • Refactor internal company UI kit to include new features and CSS classes.
  • Added feature to allow large phone number ports to be split into smaller pieces.

Technologies used: Ruby on Rails, Angular, Postgres, RSpec, Jasmine, REST APIs, Git, Target Process.
